Custom Elements Sample

Description :
This is a plug-in for DAZ Studio that shows the basics of file IO using DSON on custom implementations certain Studio elements
 
Concepts Covered :
  • DSON File IO
  • Custom Modifier
  • Custom Node
  • Custom Shape
 
Files : ./sdk/samples/saving/customelements
mycustommodifier.h Custom modifier header.
mycustommodifier.cpp Custom modifier implementation.
mycustomnode.h Custom node header.
mycustomnode.cpp Custom node implementation.
mycustomshape.h Custom shape header.
mycustomshape.cpp Custom shape implementation.
customelements.def The exports definition file for compiling under Windows.
pluginmain.cpp The plug-in definition.
customelements.vcproj Microsoft Visual C++ 2010) project file.
